title: Welcome to the Google Pixel House at NBA All-Star Weekend.
description: Google Pixel returns to NBA All-Star Weekend in San Francisco, California, with two interactive fan experiences.First, check out the Google Pixel House where you can dem…
excerpt: Google Pixel returns to NBA All-Star Weekend in San Francisco, California, with two interactive fan experiences.First, check out the Google Pixel House where you can demo Pixel features including Gemini Live and Google Lens (and look out for NBA-themed Easter egg while you’re there). We’ll also host photo ops, an open half-court and other programming — like a dunk showcase, athlete appearances, a special musical performance and more.Plus, test your basketball skills at NBA Crossover, the NBA’s official fan experience, where we’re hosting our “Pixel Pro Shot Challenge.” While you shoot hoops, we’ll have Pixel 9 Pros set up to capture the action. You’ll even be able to use the Best Take feature to choose a favorite photo to print and take home.Both events are free and open to the public Friday, February 14 through Sunday, February 16. Visit our website for more details.

html:
Google Pixel returns to NBA All-Star Weekend in San Francisco, California, with two interactive fan experiences.

First, check out the Google Pixel House where you can demo Pixel features including Gemini Live and Google Lens (and look out for NBA-themed Easter egg while you’re there). We’ll also host photo ops, an open half-court and other programming — like a dunk showcase, athlete appearances, a special musical performance and more.

Plus, test your basketball skills at NBA Crossover, the NBA’s official fan experience, where we’re hosting our “Pixel Pro Shot Challenge.” While you shoot hoops, we’ll have Pixel 9 Pros set up to capture the action. You’ll even be able to use the Best Take feature to choose a favorite photo to print and take home.

Both events are free and open to the public Friday, February 14 through Sunday, February 16. Visit our website for more details.
